 Set Up: .SmartpayApplication.StoryTests.SetUp (edit)

Cards and Surcharges

The list of card types and their valid PAN lengths are:

Supported Card Types

Name Valid Pan Lengths Valid Cvv Length
Visa 13, 16 3
Visa Debit 16 3
Visa Electron 16 3
MasterCard 16 3
Maestro 12, 19 3
American Express 15 4
JCB 16 3
Diners Club 14 3

By default, all card types have a zero surcharge for all clients.
We can set the surcharges for certain cards for test purposes, and then query the list of cards and surcharges.
For Example:
When we assign the following surcharges:

Setup Card Type Surcharges
System.MissingMethodException: Constructor on type 'Smartpay.FitFixtures.SetupCardTypeSurchargesFixture' not found.
   at System.RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl(BindingFlags bindingAttr, Binder binder, Object[] args, CultureInfo culture, Object[] activationAttributes)
   at fit.TypeName.CreateInstance()
   at fit.Fixture.LoadFixture(String theClassName)
   at fit.Fixture.DoTables(Parse theTables)
Name Surcharge
Visa 0.50
MasterCard 1.00
Diners Club 0.90

Then Expect the Cards list to be as follows:
